notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: Ethics approval has been obtained from the Western University Health Sciences Research Ethics Board (#116595). Individual study participants will provide written informed consent to participate in the study. A sample consent form is available in Additional file 2. Consent will be obtained by study investigators or clinical trials staff members.
